alert.note: Alert for Baker; Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 4:53PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, eastern Baker, central Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 530 PM EST... At 453 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bryceville, or 17 miles southwest of Callahan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Ortega, Cisco Gardens, Bryceville, Nas Jax, Normandy, San Marco, Riverside, Baldwin and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
